alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pueblo County through 430 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo Depot, or 13 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pueblo Depot around 400 PM MDT. Avondale around 405 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Boone. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
